item.title: Overloads Help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

here is the problem…hitpoints is a math integer of the MELEE_EXP.

You will have to do some modifications to get this to work I think.

Unless you could do like if(c.playerSkil[hitpoints skill id here]>= 50){ c.sendMessage("You need above 50 hitpoints to drink this"); return;

Read full topic

item.title: Overloads Help
item.dc:creator: @killadragz14 killadragz14
item.description:
@killadragz14 wrote:

Hey i seem to be having an hard time with my overloads im trying to add where no one can drink them if there hp is below 50 im trying to add it on my Pi source.
i was using this if(c.currentHealth >= 50){
c.sendMessage(“You need above 50 hitpoints to drink this”);
return;
}
but the variable dont seem to be in there so i change it to this
if(c.healthSkill >= 50){
c.sendMessage(“You need above 50 hitpoints to drink this”);
return;
}
and i keep on getting
Can anyone help me out please?

Read full topic
